p: According to the random codes, an independent research nurse will prepare the study medications (either ACEIs/ARBs or inactive placebos) in identical capsules, which were kept in bags labeled with the study numbers and "Antihypertensive agent.‚Äù Subjects who meet the eligibility criteria will be randomly assigned to either an ACEIs/ARBs continued group or an ACEIs/ARBs withheld group. The participants, anesthesiologists, surgeons, investigators responsible for data collection, and other healthcare providers will remain masked to treatment allocation until the completion of final analysis.
